name: punjabi
content:

[ C ] a person from the Punjab area of Pakistan and Northwest India
[ U ] the language spoken in the Punjab area

You can also find related words, phrases, and synonyms in the topics:
Language names
relating to or from the Punjab, or relating to its language or culture: My family is Punjabi. This dish is part of an everyday Punjabi meal. They were looking for special agents with Punjabi language skills.
More examplesFewer examplesPunjabi artists are the most outspoken in India.Now I'm living back at home, and we eat a lot of traditional Punjabi food.Only three of the 23 teachers are Punjabi speakers.
